name: CodeXChain
description: CodeX is a no-code AI powered ecosystem for WEB3 mass adoption CodeX offers an all-in-one, no-code development platform empowering users to effortlessly create, deploy, and manage entire platforms—encompassing front-end, back-end, and smart contracts—without the need for extensive coding knowledge. With CodeX, building websites, apps, games, and more becomes a quick and seamless process, achievable in less than 5 minutes.
